changeSet.author: Christopher Tubbs
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO wres.MeasurementUnit(unit_name) SELECT 'KCFS' WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wres.MeasurementUnit WHERE unit_name = 'KCFS' );

INSERT INTO wres.UnitConversion(from_unit, to_unit) SELECT measurementunit_id, measurementunit_id FROM wres.MeasurementUnit M WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wres.UnitConversion UC WHERE UC.from_unit = M.measurementunit_id AND UC.to_unit = M.measurementunit_id );

changeSet.author: Christopher Tubbs
changeSet.comment: Mimicking conversions from CFS to other measurement units
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO wres.UnitConversion(from_unit, to_unit, factor) SELECT measurementunit_id, CFS.to_unit, factor * 1000.0 FROM wres.MeasurementUnit M CROSS JOIN ( SELECT to_unit, factor FROM wres.UnitConversion UC INNER JOIN wres.MeasurementUnit MU ON MU.measurementunit_id = UC.from_unit WHERE MU.unit_name = 'CFS' or MU.unit_name = 'ft3/s' GROUP BY to_unit, factor ) AS CFS WHERE M.unit_name = 'KCFS' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wres.UnitConversion UC WHERE UC.from_unit = M.measurementunit_id AND UC.to_unit = CFS.to_unit );
changeSet.comment: Mimicking conversions to CFS from other measurement units
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO wres.UnitConversion(from_unit, to_unit, factor) SELECT CFS.from_unit, M.measurementunit_id, factor / 1000.0 FROM wres.MeasurementUnit M CROSS JOIN ( SELECT from_unit, factor FROM wres.UnitConversion UC INNER JOIN wres.MeasurementUnit MU ON MU.measurementunit_id = UC.to_unit WHERE MU.unit_name = 'CFS' ) AS CFS WHERE M.unit_name = 'KCFS' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wres.UnitConversion UC WHERE UC.to_unit = M.measurementunit_id AND UC.from_unit = CFS.from_unit );
